message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.CL 

This paper discusses the intersection of AI with HCI/HRI, specifically focusing on the engineering of cognitive and immersive systems. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.AI, followed by cs.HC and cs.RO (robotics). The paper also discusses a formal framework and automated reasoner, which suggests a potential fit for cs.LG (machine learning) and cs.CL (computational linguistics).
